unnormalised: Hey, that's interesting! I've heard Ayurveda can be amazing. My Dadi swears by it! Thinking of trying it out myself, maybe near Kerala? Heard good things about the treatments there. Does anyone have recommendations for good places near Kochi? Thinking after Onam, maybe. Heard their biryani is fantastic too! I wonder what the cost would be, like Rs. 5000 for a week maybe?
